name: mpv-youtube-dl-binding
author: Antoniy Chonkov
description: Watch flash videos from various sites using native player (like mpv) and youtube-dl.

preferences.name: player
preferences.title: Native player location
preferences.description: Specify native player executable full path

preferences.name: hotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Specify hotkey binding to start the player for current page

preferences.name: params
preferences.title: Additional player parameters
preferences.description: Specify additional parameters to pass the native player when started. Leave empty if none are required. Use %%url%% placeholder to be able to pass video link as a parameter (useful when using custom script to execute additional logic).

preferences.name: ytStartPlAtIndex
preferences.title: Start playlist playback from the selected video
preferences.description: While in Youtube playlist, context menu command will play the playlist starting from the selected video.

preferences.name: altClick
preferences.title: alt + click
preferences.description: Launch player for a link on 'alt + click'
